WorkItem.Description:
I'm receiving an error in the status bar every few seconds while I'm typing to the tune of the following:

Smart Indenting task took more than 1 second(s) to complete. Try again later. 
Formatting task took more than 2 second(s) to complete. Try again later. 

This is with TypeScript 1.0 on Visual Studio 2013 Update 2 RC.

I believe this may be an issue that was fixed before but has regressed into the latest TypeScript build. Here's the related issue I found: https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/779

If I go into Tools > Options > Text Editor > TypeScript > Tabs and Indenting to "Block" or "None" instead of "Smart" and also uncheck all of the Automatic Formatting options under TypeScript > Formatting > General, the issue goes away, but I also lose a lot of the formatting/indenting functionality.
WorkItem.Summary: TS 1.0 Visual Studio stalls while typing with "Smart Indenting took too long" message

Comments.Message: Thanks for the report. It sounds like this is a duplicate of https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/2386. When that is fixed if you're still seeing issues do re-open this or file a new issue.

Also, note in 2386 the proposed workaround is only to disable formatting on ; but not all formatting options. That is hopefully a less painful workaround for now. If you're still seeing issues after that workaround then this is indeed likely to be a different issue we'll need to investigate so re-open this as appropriate.
